text: I love my church! Really blessed to be a part of The Bible Church community, and to grow and serve here.

Situated just on left of #westcoastplaza.
Peace haven
Selfless people with beautiful hearts

The church just celebrated their 60th anniversary opening door to the community. Theme was "Blessed 2B A Blessing"
$60k was raised thru their congregation to bless d needy in the west coast community.

Services r held on sat/sun whc incl:-
Teenacity
Youth small group(DG Time)
English service
KFC- Kids For Christ
Chinese service

And many events around d year like:-
24-7 prayer relay
AGM
Alpha course
Marriage prep course
Church camps
Missionaries
Church retreats
Baptismal services
And many more...
Good church for families and good Christian education syatem from toddlers to adults.

A Bible based church where God's Word is taught The folks here r so caring,friendly n warm esp ps Anthony n the Chinese congregation Really touched by their love, concern n thoughtfulness God bless you all in Jesus's mighty name Amen üôè
I enjoyed worshiping in this church. people here are high class, and they will respect each other more. located near Infiniti and newest.
